慢性中毒: (まんせいちゅうどく) - chronic addiction; chronic intoxication
慢性気管支炎: (まんせいきかんしえん) - chronic bronchitis
慢性疲労症候群: (まんせいひろうしょうこうぐん) - {med} chronic fatigue syndrome; CFS
慢性疾患: (まんせいしっかん) - chronic malady
慢性肝炎: (まんせいかんえん) - chronic hepatitis
慢性閉塞性呼吸器疾患: (まんせいへいそくせいこきゅうきしっかん) - chronic obstructive respiratory disease
慢性閉塞性肺疾患: (まんせいへいそくせいはいしっかん) - chronic obstructive pulmonary disease; COPD
慢性関節リウマチ: (まんせいかんせつリウマチ) - chronic rheumatoid arthritis
慢性関節リューマチ: (まんせいかんせつリューマチ) - chronic rheumatoid arthritis
慢性骨髄性白血病: (まんせいこつずいせいはっけつびょう) - chronic myelogenous (myeloid) leukemia; CML
慢慢的: (マンマンデー) - slow (chi: màn màn de); at ease
慣らう: (ならう) - to imitate; to follow; to emulate
慣らし: (ナラシ) - running-in; breaking in (e.g. engine, etc.); accustomizing; warming up
慣らす: (ならす) - (esp. 慣らす) to accustom/to train (e.g. one's ear); (esp. 馴らす) to tame/to domesticate/to train (e.g. an animal)
慣れっこ: (なれっこ) - being used to ...; getting used to ...; being accustomed to; being conditioned to; be familiar with
慣れっこになる: (なれっこになる) - to become used to; to become familiar with; to grow accustomed to
慣れる: (nareru) - acostumar-se, familiarizar-se com; tornar-se habilidoso em, ganhar experiência em; tornar-se domesticável, tornar-se domesticado; acostumar-se a fazer
慣れ親しむ: (なれしたしむ) - to become familiar with; to get used to
慣わし: (ならわし) - custom; habit; customary practice
慣例: (かんれい) - custom; precedent; of convention
慣性の法則: (かんせいのほうそく) - law of inertia
慣性モーメント: (かんせいモーメント) - moment of inertia
慣性航法: (かんせいこうほう) - inertial navigation system
慣性誘導: (かんせいゆうどう) - inertial guidance
慣手段: (かんしゅだん) - conventional means; usual means
慣用句: (かんようく) - idiomatic usage; common usage
慣用名: (かんようめい) - common name; popular name; trivial name
慣用暗号システム: (かんようあんごうシステム) - conventional cryptosystem
慣用暗号方式: (かんようあんごうほうしき) - conventional cryptosystem
慣用法: (かんようほう) - usage (esp. of language)
慣用表現: (かんようひょうげん) - (yoji) idiomatic expression; idiom
慣用語句: (かんようごく) - idiom; idiomatic phrase
慣用読み: (かんようよみ) - reading of a word or kanji using its customary pronunciation (which is not necessarily correct)
慣用音: (かんようおん) - traditional (popularly accepted) pronunciation (e.g. of a kanji)
慣習国際法: (かんしゅうこくさいほう) - customary international law
慣習法: (かんしゅうほう) - {law} common law; {law} customary law (in international law)
慣行: (かんこう) - customary practice; habit; traditional event
慣行取引き: (かんこうとりひき) - usual business practices
慣行犯: (かんこうはん) - habitual criminal/recidivist; recidivism/habitual criminal activity
慥か: (たしか) - sure/certain/positive/definite; reliable/trustworthy/safe/sound/firm/accurate/correct/exact; If I'm not mistaken/If I remember correctly/If I remember rightly
慥かめる: (たしかめる) - to ascertain; to check; to make sure
慧敏: (けいびん) - clever; of quick intellect
慧日: (えにち) - sun of wisdom; Buddha's or Bodhisattva's limitless light of wisdom
慧眼: (けいがん) - discerning (quick) eye; keen insight
慨する: (がいする) - to regret; to deplore
慨世: (がいせい) - deploring the course of public events
慨世憂国: (がいせいゆうこく) - (yoji) worrying about the conditions of the country out of sheer patriotism
慨嘆: (がいたん) - deploring; lamentation; regret; complaint
慨歎: (がいたん) - deploring; lamentation; regret; complaint
慫慂: (しょうよう) - advice; recommendation; suggestion; inducement; persuasion
慮り: (おもんばかり) - thought; consideration; fears
慮る: (おもんばかる) - to consider carefully; to deliberate thoroughly; to think over
慰み: (なぐさみ) - amusement; diversion (to pass time); pastime; recreation
慰み半分: (なぐさみはんぶん) - partly for fun; capricious
慰み物: (なぐさみもの) - source of amusement; plaything
慰み者: (なぐさみもの) - (person treated as a) plaything
慰む: (なぐさむ) - to be diverted; to forget one's worries; to comfort
慰める: (なぐさめる) - to comfort; to console; to amuse
慰め顔: (なぐさめがお) - consolatory look; comforting look
慰労会: (いろうかい) - party given in recognition of a person's services
慰労金: (いろうきん) - bonus; reward for one's services
慰問袋: (いもんぶくろ) - soldier's comfort bag
慰安婦: (いあんふ) - (euphemism)  women working in military brothels (esp. those forced into prostitution as a form of sexual slavery by the Japanese military during WWII); comfort women
慰安所: (いあんじょ) - comfort women brothel (during World War II); military brothel
慰安旅行: (いあんりょこう) - pleasure trip; company (office) trip
慰留: (いりゅう) - dissuasion from resigning or leaving
慰藉料: (いしゃりょう) - consolation money; solatium; reparation; damages; settlement
慰謝料: (いしゃりょう) - consolation money; solatium; reparation; damages; settlement
